trans-unit.source: Maps a browser request to a mutable data object.
trans-unit.target: 将浏览器请求映射到可变数据对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.ModelBinding.MutableObjectModelBinder"></xref> class.
Binds the model by using the specified execution context and binding context.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的执行上下文和绑定上下文中绑定模型。

trans-unit.source: The execution context.
The binding context.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: The model could not be bound because one or more required properties are missing.
trans-unit.target: 无法绑定模型，因为缺少一个或多个必需的属性。

trans-unit.source: (The message specifies the first missing property.)
trans-unit.target: （该消息指定第一个缺少的属性。）

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a property can be updated.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否可以更新属性。

trans-unit.source: A property can be updated if its <xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 可以更新属性，如果其<xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性值是`false`。</xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If a property's <xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value is `true`, the property can be updated if it is not a value type, a string, or an array.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性的<xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性值是`true`，如果不是值类型、 字符串或数组属性进行更新。</xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadata.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Metadata for the property to be evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 要进行求值的属性的元数据。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property can be updated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以更新的属性;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the model.
The execution context.
The binding context.
The model object.
Creates a model instance if an instance does not yet exist in the binding context.
trans-unit.target: 如果实例的绑定上下文中尚不存在，请创建的模型实例。

trans-unit.source: The execution context.
The binding context.
Returns metadata for properties of the model.
trans-unit.target: 返回属性的模型的元的数据。

trans-unit.source: The execution context.
The binding context.
Metadata for properties of the model.
Sets the value of a specified property.
The execution context.
The binding context.
Metadata for the property to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的属性的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Validation information about the property.
